description: George MacLaren, 33, admitted resisting arrest and breaching the island's lockdown rules.
title: Coronavirus: Man jailed for trying to spit at Manx police officers
title_page: Coronavirus: Man jailed for trying to spit at Manx police officers - BBC News
maintext: The court was told that he thought the relaxation of lockdown rules meant he could "go out as much as he liked" and he was uncooperative because he "didn't understand why he shouldn't be there".
